acceptStrategist().details: This can only be called after the pending strategist timelock (7 days)

params._yaxis: The address of the YAX token

recoverToken(address,uint256,address).details: This contract should never hold tokens

params._allowed: The status of if it is allowed
The status of if it is allowed
The status of if it is allowed
The status of if it is allowed

setHalted().details: Withdraws will still work, allowing users to exit the protocol

params._insuranceFee: The value for the insurance fee

params._insurancePool: The address of the insurance pool

params._insurancePoolFee: The value for the insurance pool fee

params._stakingPool: The address of the staking pool

params._stakingPoolShareFee: The value for the staking pool fee

params._treasuryFee: The value for the treasury fee

params._withdrawalProtectionFee: The value for the withdrawal protection fee

acceptStrategist().notice: Updates the strategist to the pending strategist

addVault(address).notice: Adds a token to be able to be deposited for a given vault

getHarvestFeeInfo().notice: Returns a tuple of:     YAXIS token address,     Treasury address,     Treasury fee

getToken(address).notice: Returns an array of token addresses for a given vault

recoverToken(address,uint256,address).notice: Allows the strategist to pull tokens out of this contract

removeVault(address).notice: Removes a token from being able to be deposited for a given vault

setAllowedController(address,bool).notice: Sets the permission for the given controller

setAllowedConverter(address,bool).notice: Sets the permission for the given converter

setAllowedStrategy(address,bool).notice: Sets the permission for the given strategy

setAllowedVault(address,bool).notice: Sets the permission for the given vault

setController(address,address).notice: Sets the vault address for a controller

setHalted().notice: Sets the protocol as halted, disallowing all deposits forever

setStakingPoolShareFee(uint256).notice: Sets the staking pool share fee

setStrategist(address).notice: Sets the pending strategist and the timestamp

userdoc.notice: This contract serves as the central point for governance-voted variables. Fees and permissioned addresses are stored and referenced in this contract only.
